Cell.Data: You can't reach this skill yet
You have invested points waiting for confirmation. Would you like to confirm them?
Onaylanmayı bekleyen dağıtılmış puanların var. Onaylamak ister misin?
Would you like to reset your progression in the Gate of Fates? You will get all you passive skills points and attribute points back.
Kader Geçidi'ndeki ilerlemeni sıfırlamak istiyor musun? Bütün edilgen yetenek ve nitelik puanlarını geri kazanacaksın.
The Passive Skills have been modified since the last time you played and we had no other choice but to reset your progression in the Gate of Fates.
Oyunu son oynadığından beri Edilgen Yetenekler değişti. Bu nedenle Kader Geçidi'ndeki ilerlemeni sıfırladık. Puanlarını tekrar dağıtabilirsin.
This Passive Skill is not implemented yet. Taking it won't cost you any skill point.
Bu Edilgen henüz tasarlanmadı. Seçmek sana puan harcatmayacak.
You need to stand next to the Gate of Fates in Amarth to rotate the Rings
Halkaları döndürmek için Amarth'da, Kader Geçidi'nin yakınında olmalısın
You don't have enough skill points to spend
Weapons or fists, you name it.
Some say I'm quick tempered. The truth is, they are too slow.
Here’s something they don’t teach in the Legion : failing.
You have something on your head… got it.
Keep your friends distant, and your enemies even more.
There are two rules for success: 1) Don't tell all you know.
People say a wizard never reveals his secrets, so I’m not going to tell you the rest of this story.
Nothing can beat the power of the mind.
Some of us feel the urge to choose between sorcery and weapons. I choose violence.
I'm one with the Aether, and the Aether is with me.
Adaptation is the only reason our World survived so far.
I don't think that's intended, but that mixture tastes pretty good.
I will have my vengeance, in this life or the next.
A day without killing is a day wasted.
Everybody dies eventually. But you first.
Did you know that if I take all the veins from your body and lay them end to end… you will die?
I'm going to fill your body with holes. So to speak.
My girlfriend accused me of cheating. I told her she was starting to sound like my wife.
Who said ranged weapons were meant to be used from a long distance?
Of course you should fight fire with fire. You should fight everything with fire.
Your body is a maze designed for Lightning to propagate.
Who need swords when one can control the Storm?
%1%2 to Agility when you're not moving.
%2 Dodge Chance if your Health is full (bonus decreasing linearly with your Health level).
%2 to Agility if all your equipped Armor parts are of the Light type.

Gives you a chance to immobilize enemies during %2 on each strike depending on their current Health (up to %1 if they are near death).

%2 to your Cleave Factor for each target successively hit by a Cleave.

%1 Damage Reduction on frontal attacks (%2 angle).
%2 Damage Reduction against an enemy that you just hit.
Ignores fatal strikes and leaves you with 1 Health (consumes all your Stamina, %2 Cooldown).
Grants a %2 bonus to all Ranged attacks in the form of raw Aetherial Damage.
%2 to Physical Resistance when your Willpower is empty.
%2 to Spells Damage when your Willpower is full.
%2 to all Damage done against Frozen, Burning or Stunned enemies.
All Aether Damage become Lightning Damage, Sacred Damage become Fire Damage and Shadow Damage become Frost Damage.
%2 to Spells Resistance if your Health is full.
%1 to your Resistance to an Element during %2 when being hit by that Element (stackable %3 times).
%1 to your Damage with an Element during %2 when being hit by that Element (stackable %3 times).
You gain a %2 Elemental Damage stack each second (stackable up to %1 times, reset when you do a non-Elemental Damage).
%2 to the duration of Burning, Freezing and Shocking effects you inflict.
Allows Burn and Shock to deal critical Damage and Freeze to get a critical duration multiplier.
%1 to your Critical Chance (Weapons & Spells) with Frost Damage and %2 to your chance to inflict Freeze.
%2 to the duration of all Freezing effects you inflict.
%2 of the Resisted part of suffered Elemental Damage heal you instead.

Your next Dodge is always successful right after a kill (lasts %2).

You gain two Momentum Absorption stacks per hit instead of one and their maximum stacks number is doubled.

Your Dodgeroll allows you to go through enemies.

Your next Dash will always be free during %2 after performing a Dodgeroll.

%1 to Physical Damage and Attack Speed when moving and %2 after stopping to move.
Increases by %2 the duration of Momentum after stopping to move.
Increases by %2 all Damage taken from the last hit enemy, but decreases by %1 all Damage taken from all other enemies.
%2 of incoming Damage is returned to the attacker.
%2 of incoming Damage is returned to the attacker when using %4.
%2 to Physical Damage for each unused Stamina point.
%1 to Critical Damage (Weapons) during %2 each time you shoot the same enemy with Ranged weapons (stackable %3 times, reset when you change targets).
Allows you to conserve the "Meticulous killer" stacks if your target dies.
%2 to Critical Damage (Weapons & Spells) against full-life enemies.

Grants you a Critical Chance bonus (Weapons & Spells) which increases the more your target is isolated (up to %2).
%2 to Critical Chance (Weapons & Spells) against immobilized enemies.
%2 to Critical Chance (Weapons) in the back of enemies with Melee weapons.

%2 Chance to Instantly kill Frozen enemies (common) with Physical Damage.
%2 to the Combo Timer of all Skills (allows to easily reach higher Combo levels).
Continuously shooting the same enemy may double your next shot.
Your ranged shots have a %1 Chance to bounce to another enemy in a %2 radius.
%1 to your Spellcasting Speed during %2 when picking up an Willpower Globe.
Leaves a trap on the ground which slows down enemies when Dodgerolling (%2 cooldown).
%1 to all Physical Damage and suspended Willpower Generation during %2 when your Rage becomes full.
Increases by %1 your chance to inflict Bleed on Rend-based skills.
Each strike with Dual Daggers increases by %1 the chance to inflict Bleed of with Rend-based skills during %2 (stackable %3 times).
%1 Chance to inflict a %2 Bleed on Critical Strikes (Melee only).
%1 Chance to inflict a %2 Bleed on all Melee attacks.
%1 Chance to inflict a %2 Bleed on back-stabs (Melee only).
%1 Chance to inflict a %2 Bleed on enemies around you when Dodgerolling.
%1 Chance to cause a %2 Bleed in Melee.

Allows your Bleeding stacks to deal critical Damage.
%1 Chance to Fear enemies during %2 on hits.
%2 to your Life On Hit Chance.
%1 Chance to steal %2 Health points on Hits.
%1 Chance to inflict a %2 Bleed on Critical Strikes (Ranged only).
Increases the Bleeding Rate of all Bleeding stacks you inflict depending on your Attack Speed.
%1 to the Bleeding Damage Rate against Bleeding enemies during %2 when hitting them.
%1 Chance to trigger a %2 Frenzy each time a Burn ticks on a Burning target.
%1 Chance to trigger a %2 Frenzy each time a Poison ticks on a Poisoned target.
%2 Chance to clear up to %1 Burning stacks when Dodgerolling (chance is increased if you are in water, even more if it rains).
%2 to the duration of all Burning stacks you inflict.
Inflicting Burning stacks prevents your target from regenerating its Health.
%2 Chance to Propagate Flames with Fire skills.
Lightning Damage can set your enemies on Fire as well as Shocking them (based on your Shocking Chance and Damage).
%1 Chance to Freeze enemies during %2 on hits.
Your Movement and Attack Speed is reduced by %1%2.
All Fire spells can now propagate flames on the ground.
Gives your weapons Frost Damage during %2 when hitting a frozen enemy.
%1 Chance to cast a small Frost Nova when killing a frozen enemy.
%1 to the Damage done by the propagated Lightnings in water. Gives you a small chance to propagate Lightning attacks even out of water.
%1 Chance to cast a small Lightning Nova when killing enemies with Lightning Damage.
%1 Chance to Shock and Stun during %2 on hits.
%2 to your chance to Shock with Lightning Damage.
%2 Chance to clear a random status effect when drinking a Potion.
%2 Chance to clear a random status effect each second.
%2 to the Poisoning Damage Rate on Poisoned enemies when they are attacking.
Reduces by %2 the duration of all Status Ailments you suffer.
You can wield Two-handed Melee Weapons as if they were One-handed.
%2 to the drop chance of Globes when hitting enemies with Elemental Damage.
%1 Chance to cast a small Elemental Nova when picking up a Globe (the Element depends on the Globe type).

%2 to your Rage Globe picking radius.
%2 to your Health Globe picking radius.

%2 to the drop Rate of Health Globes when your current Health is below %1.
Health Globes now also refill %1 charge(s) of your Health potions.
Health Potions no longer Heal, but greatly increase your Health Regeneration instead.
Equipped Potions and Phials refill %2 faster.

Your Dodgeroll is permanently replaced by a Protection Form which lasts %2 per Stamina point (stackable %1 times) and gives you extra Defense, Stun, Knock-back and Blown-Away Resistances while reducing you Movement Speed. Fully compatible with what previously affected the Dodgeroll.
Increases by %2 the Invulnerability time of the Protection Form.
Instantly heals %2 of your maximum Health when you cast the Protection Form.
When in Protection Form, you get a %2 Physical Damage bonus for each Toughness point you have.
Breaks Stun when you launch the Protection Form (%2 Cooldown).
Each hit done with Two-handed Hammer increases by %1 your Physical Impulse Chance with Impulsion skills during %2 (stackable %3 times).
%1 Chance to Stun enemies during %2 on each hit.
%2 to the duration of all Stun effects inflicted.
Increases by %2 the duration of all the Stun effects you inflict.
Reduces by %2 the duration of all the Stun effects you take.
%1 Chance to Stun close enemies with Ranged weapons (in a %2 range).
%1 Chance to Knock-back close enemies with Ranged weapons (in a %2 range).
You can't be Knocked-back by attacks Blocked by %4
%1 Chance to Knock-down enemies around you when Dodgerolling.
You can't be Knocked-down by attacks blocked by %4.
You get back on your feet faster after a Knock-down.
You can return a Knock-down effect to its source with %4.
%1 to Physical Impulse Chance with Impulsion skills.
%1 Chance to expulse enemies on hit.
%1 Chance to Knock-down enemies on hit.
%1 Chance to Knock-down stunned enemies during %2 when hitting them.
Grants you a Gladiator stack (%1 to Attack Speed and %2 to Physical Damage) each time you kill somebody successively. Those stacks are removed when your killing chain stops.
%1 to the maximum number of your Gladiator stacks.
%2 to the duration of your Gladiators stacks and killing chain.
Casting Fire Spells gives you Ardent stacks which can inflict Burn stacks to enemies around you.
Each Ardent stack increases your Fire Damage and chance to inflict Burning stacks.
You gain Ardent stacks faster, but reaching the maximum will cast a Fire Nova that harms enemies and yourself, removing all your stacks.
%1 to your Thorns Damage for each enemy in a %2 radius.
%1 to your Thorns Damage during %2 each time you hit an enemy (stackable %3 times).
Deprecated magic effect - should not appear in the game.
This Skill description shouldn't appear in the game.
Creates a Storm Area each time you hit the same area with Elemental attacks (stackable intensity). Will help you propagate Elemental effects when hitting enemies inside a Storm Area.
Increases by %1 the duration of all your Storm Areas.
Grants you a %2 Elemental Damage stack for each Storm stack when you're in a Storm Area.
Grants you a %2 Elemental Resistance stack for each Storm stack when you're in a Storm Area.
You always benefit from the Protective Storm and Destructive Storm bonus of your active Storm which has the most stacks, even if you are not in a Storm Area.
Increases by %2 the Range of your Dash.
Increases by %2 the Speed of your Dash.
Increases by %2 the Damage done by your Dash.
Your Dash generates Rage on hits.
Increases by %2 the Critical Chance of your Dash.
Increases by %2 the Critical Damage of your Dash.
%2 to the Damage of your Dash during %1 for each Rage point you spend.
Instantly heal %1 of your Health when performing a Dash.
Your Dash may hit several enemies around your target.
Reduces by %2 the Cooldown of your Dash.
Snares by %1 during %2 all enemies hit by your Dash.
Cancels your current Dash Cooldown on each kill and increase your Dash Critical Chance by %1 during %2.
%2 to the range of your Melee Weapons.
Heals you from %2 of all the Thorns Damage you inflict.
%2 to Physical Resistance when Channeling an attack, with an extra %1 if you're Blocking with your Shield.
The Critical Chance bonus given by your Agility level is %2 higher.
Critical Strikes have a small chance to instantly kill common enemies.
Increases by %2 your Critical Chance (Weapons & Spells) against enemies who don't target you.
%1 to Attack Speed, Spellcasting Speed and Move Speed during %2 each time you kill an uncommon enemy.
Critical Strikes inflict %1 Weakness stacks for %2.
Gives all your shots an Protection Piercing bonus (Physical) depending on your distance to the target (up to %1 if the target is closer than %2).

%2 to the duration of all the Curse stacks you inflict.

%2 to the propagation radius of your Cursing stacks.

%2 to your Curse Efficiency against enemies who already suffer from Weakness stacks.
%2 to the drop rate of Health Globes.
Inflict %1 Poison stack(s) during %2 on hits with Melee and Ranged Weapons.
Inflict %1 Curse stack(s) during %2 on hits with Melee and Ranged Weapons.
Inflict %1 Frailty and Weakness stack(s) during %2 on hits with Melee and Ranged Weapons.
Inflict %1 Burning stack(s) during %2 on hits with Melee and Ranged Weapons.
Shock targets on hits with Melee and Ranged Weapons.
Inflict %1 Bleed stack(s) during %2 on hits with Melee and Ranged Weapons.
Freeze targets during %2 on hits with Melee and Ranged Weapons.
%1 to all Damage done with Ranged Weapons if there is no enemy around you in a %2 radius.
%2 Rage generated on first hit with Melee and Ranged weapons when you are not in a fight.
Increases Rage generation of your Ranged shots the further you are from your target.
Increases your Critical Chance (Weapons & Spells) the further you are from your target.
The first hit done or taken doesn't put you in Fight mode (%2 cooldown).
Daggers Damage are increased by your Agility instead of your Ferocity.
%1 Chance to gain %2 Health points on kills.
%1 Chance to gain %2 Willpower points on kills.
%1 Chance to gain %2 Rage points on kills.
You can Block all incoming attacks, even Magical ones.
%4 has a %1 chance to return incoming projectiles.
You can no longer attack when cloaked by %4, but the effect lasts longer and allows you to move through enemies.
In passive mode, %4 decreases your Presence level.
When using %4 to get into Offensive mode, you perform a 360° attack with your equipped Weapons. Increases Offensive mode cooldown.
When using %4 to get into Defensive mode, you repel all enemies around you. Increases Defensive mode cooldown.
When %4 is in Offensive mode, you generate more Rage when hitting enemies.
When %4 is in Defensive mode, you generate Rage when receiving hits from enemies.
Using %4 also reduces the Willpower and Rage costs of all your Spells.
%4 will steal Willpower for each enemy surrounding you at launch.
You can place one more trap on the ground with %4 and have one extra charge to use.
You can place traps away from you with %4, not necessarily at your feet.
When activated, %4 traps leave an area on the ground which inflict Frailty stacks to nearby enemies.
When you are invisible, you can use Potions and Phials without spending their charges, even if they are empty.
Reduces your Presence level by %2 if all your equipped Armor parts are of the Light type.
%1 to your Presence level during %2 each time you kill an enemy (stackable %3 times).
If your Presence exceeds %1, you gain a bonus to all Damage you inflict depending on your total Presence level.
%2 to all direct Damage done (not including Status Ailments).
Your Ranged shots have a %1 Chance to bounce when hitting walls or terrain.
Ranged shots that bounce on walls have a %1 chance to split into 3 projectiles.
%4 traps make use of your active Ammunitions when they explode.
%1 Chance to purge all current Resource transfers in %2 when hitting an enemy.
%1 Chance to purge all current Willpower transfers in %2 when hitting an enemy.
%1 Chance to purge all current Rage transfers in %2 when hitting an enemy.
%1 Chance to instantly cancel all current Resource transfers when hitting an enemy.
%1 Chance to instantly cancel all current Willpower transfers when hitting an enemy.
%1 Chance to instantly cancel all current Rage transfers when hitting an enemy.
%1 Chance to purge all current Resource transfers in %2 when being hit by an enemy.
%1 Chance to purge all current Willpower transfers in %2 when being hit by an enemy.
%1 Chance to purge all current Rage transfers in %2 when being hit by an enemy.
%1 Chance to instantly cancel all current Resource transfers when being hit by an enemy.
%1 Chance to instantly cancel all current Willpower transfers when being hit by an enemy.
%1 Chance to instantly cancel all current Rage transfers when being hit by an enemy.
You can perform multiple melee hits per strike with this weapon.
%2 to the drop chance of Globes on Bleeding enemies.
%2 to your Blocking Chance when you are not moving.
%2 to your Blocking Chance when you are moving.
%2 to your Blocking Chance against Fire attacks.
%2 to Critical Chance (Weapons & Spells) against enemies whose Health is below %1.
Blocking a Fire attack will give you Fire attacks during %2.
%2 Chance %4 when killing an enemy if you are under %1 of your maximum Health.
%4 have a chance to gain one charge each time you perform a Critical Strike.
%4 have a higher number of charges available and generates them faster, but reaching 0 will trigger a cooldown during which charges don't regenerate.
%4 have a higher number of charges available.
%4 have a chance to gain charges each time you perform a Dodgeroll.
%4 regains charges each time you cycle through the different Ammunitions.
%2 to all Damage done with Swords and Broadswords.
%2 to all Damage done with Axes and Battleaxes.
%2 to all Damage done with Hammers and Warhammers.
%2 to all Damage done with Shields.
%2 to all Damage done with Daggers.
%2 to all Damage done with Staves.
%2 to all Damage done with Crossbows.
Each Critical hit done with a Sword or Broadsword may temporarily increase your Attack Speed.
Each Critical hit done with a Hammer or Warhammer may Stun your target.
Each Critical hit done with an Axe or Battleaxe may inflict one Bleeding stack to your target.
Each Critical hit done with a Shield may trigger a temporary Defense boost.
Each Critical hit done with a Dagger may ignore part of your target's Physical Protection.
Each Critical hit done with a Crossbow may shatter your target's Physical Protection.
Each Critical hit done with a Staff may replenish your Willpower.
You can now Block attacks with any kind of Melee weapons, not necessarily Shields.
%2 to your Chance to perform Overkills.
%1 to your Presence level during %2 each time you Block an attack (stackable %3 times).
If your Presence exceeds %1, you gain a Critical Damage bonus (Weapons & Spells) depending on your total Presence level.
%1 to your Presence level if your Rage is full (bonus decreasing linearly with your Rage level).
%2 to the duration of the various bonus you gain when performing an Overkill.
Overkills now grant you a temporary %2 Ferocity bonus on top of their other effects.
Overkills now grant you a temporary %2 Toughness bonus on top of their other effects.
Overkills now grant you a temporary %2 Wisdom bonus on top of their other effects.
%2 to all Damage done with One-Handed Weapons (stackable when Dual-Wielding)
%2 to all Damage done with Two-Handed Weapons (including Staves).
%2 to the duration of the Frenzy effects you inflict.
Frenzied enemies have increased Damage while the Frenzy lasts.
%2 Chance to inflict %1 Weakness stacks when inflicting Frenzy.
When you are Cursed, you propagate Status Ailments to everyone around you, not just you allies anymore.
When a Frenzied enemy kills someone, its Frenzy duration is increased.
%2 Chance to generate a Corpse when killing an enemy.
%2 Chance to generate a Corpse when performing an Overkill.
When an Overkill generate Corpses, you have a %2 Chance to drop %1 extra Corpse(s).
%4 can consume more Corpses and reach them further.
%4 will have a larger explosion radius for each consumed Corpse.
%4 regenerates your Willpower each time it consumes a Corpse.
Corpses now keep trace of the Status Ailments their owners were suffering before dying, which can affect the properties of all Spells which use Corpses.
When a Frenzied enemy kills someone, it inflicts %1 Curse stacks to itself.
Your Dash now leaves a temporary Poisoning trail on its path.
Your Dash and its trail consume Corpses along the way and heal you for each one consumed.
Greatly reduces the Willpower cost of %4, but using the spell will inflict Poison stacks to yourself as well as enemies.
%4 has a wider range and inflicts Poison stacks at a higher rate.
%4 greatly increases your Toughness while active.
While %4 is active, the Poison trail of your Dash lasts longer.
%4 has a Chance to restitute a part of consumed Corpses when it explodes.

Critical Hits with Shadow Damage always inflict Curse.
%2 to the Duration of all the Fear effects you inflict.
%2 to your Presence level when your are Cursed, Poisoned or Bleeding.
Inflicting Frailty stacks prevents your target from regenerating its Health over time.
%1 to Health Regeneration for each Poisoned enemy surrounding you (%2 radius).
%2 to all Damage inflicted by your Status Ailments.
%4 can now have up to 3 marked targets at the same time (you still need to mark them separately).
When an enemy marked by %4 dies, the mark may jump to another enemy in a %2 radius.
%2 to your Chance to perform Overkills against enemies marked by %4.
%2 to your Chance to generate Corpses when killing enemies marked by %4.
You have a small chance to instantly kill common enemies marked by %4.
When your total Presence is below %1, you gain a Health Regeneration bonus the lower your Presence is (up to %2 if your Presence is null).
When your total Presence is below %1, you gain an Attack Speed and Spellcasting Speed bonus the lower your Presence is (up to %2 if your Presence is null).
When your total Presence is above %1, you gain a Dodge Chance bonus depending on your total Presence.
Increases by %2 the Critical Damage Multiplier of your Dash against enemies marked by %4.
%2 to your Chance to perform Overkills with Critical Strikes.
Overkills now grant you a temporary %2 Agility bonus on top of their other effects.
%4 goes through enemies and may drag several simultaneous targets.
Using %4 by maintaining the key will drag you towards your target instead of dragging your target towards you.
Increases the number of Bleeding stacks inflicted by %4 and their duration.
Increases by %1 the maximum number of Combo hits you can perform with weapons.
When landing on you, a target hooked by %4 will receive an extra Damage base on your equipped weapons which has high chance to inflict Stun.
%4 summons 3 chains instead of one, allowing you to hit a higher number of targets.
%2 to all Damage done with Pistols.
%1 Chance to gain %2 Willpower points on hits.
%1 Chance to gain %2 Willpower points on received hits.
%2 to your chance to inflict Stun with Physical Damage.
Your Rage Generation when hitting enemies is reverted, generating Willpower instead.
%2 to the drop rate of Willpower Globes.
%2 to the drop rate of Rage Globes.
Willpower globes will instantly refill %2 of your total Willpower.
Rage globes will instantly refill %2 of your total Rage and will trigger your Rage Conservation.
Your Health regeneration is applied to your Willpower regeneration.
Gives you a Melee Damage bonus depending on your total Wisdom.
Enemies hit by your Dash are repelled.
Your Dash inflicts Aether Damage instead of Physical.
%2 to the Aether cost of Spells when you are in Fight mode.
%2 to Movement Speed when your Aether is full.
%2 to Attack Speed (Melee & Ranged) when your Aether is full.
%1 to gain %2 Aether when performing an Aether Overkill.

[BONUS]%2%[/BONUS] to the Willpower and Rage costs of Spells.

Your next hit will be Critical.
Your next Dash will be free (it won't activate a cooldown).
[BONUS]+%2%[/BONUS] to your Physical Damage and Attack Speed.
Your next Dodge will be successful.
[BONUS]+%2[/BONUS] to your Dodge Chance and Critical Damage (Armes).
